#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define fi first
#define se second
ll mpow(ll a, ll n,ll mod)
{ll ret=1;ll b=a;while(n) {if(n&1)
    ret=(ret*b)%mod;b=(b*b)%mod;n>>=1;}
return (ll)ret;
}
using namespace std;
#define mem(x,a) memset(x,a,sizeof(x))
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define all(v) v.begin(),v.end()
using namespace std;
#define N (int)(1e4+4)
int a[N];
void solve(){
    int n,k;
    cin>>n>>k;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
        cin>>a[i];
    }
    sort(a+1,a+n+1);
    cout<<a[k]<<endl;
}
int main(){
   //ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
   int t=1;
   //cin>>t;
   for(int i=1;i<=t;i++){
       //printf("Case #%d: ",i);
       solve();
   }
   return 0;
}
